title: Zilon
author: Zilon
content: There is no more time for analysis, research or strategy just buy!!!If its falling buyIf the chart is looking unclear buyIf you can't find the support zone buyIf the said bitcoin will still fall just buyKeep buying as you buyWhen the price becomes scary just buyIf the say Bitcoin is about to crash just buyif you hear Bitcoin can't survive the dip keep buyingJust buy because you will smileEven when you start smiling just buyBuy until the force of the smile becomes heavyBuy even in the midst of discouragmentDon't just buy ensure you hodl...

comments.author: Peanutswar
comments.body: Not all the time you need to make a buy always makes sure you have a designated goal, if you have a basic understanding in technical analysis in the bitcoin chart and gives you an insight if this is ideal to buy go a head but if the market is consciously crashing and you still keep buying and you are just a small time investor for sure your investment get reduce its price onwards, we have different goals why buying an asset possibly.1. Coin has a potential retracement2. Good for future purpose3. Gives a good profit 4. Hold for a long term and etc.Always make a plan not just execute it every time a position or investment.

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: By the way, nice poem. But don't get too emotional about it. There are numerous opportunities to purchase Bitcoin that we are overlooking. For example, a few days ago, the Bitcoin price was hovering around $15K, but many people expected it to drop even further and thus failed to accumulate. As a result, it was a good time to buy. We miss the chance such opportunities and later regret it. Furthermore, the current price is sufficient to accumulate. When deciding whether or not to buy, think deeply rather than becoming emotional. If you want to make quick money, don't buy when the market is suddenly pumped.

comments.author: Fullcoinese
comments.body: a great poem to show new investors who panic easily at the sight of fluctuating market conditions. people who panic when they see the market go down, then sell at a loss. people who panic when the price starts to go up a little. Your poem provides a lesson to remind us that we must hold onto assets when conditions are bad. for those who do not have skills in analysis and technique. buy anytime and under any conditions to hold long term.

comments.body: your poetry is to me like a DCA.because I used to do this every week or every month, i.e. buy and then buy. no matter what price range. keep buying.because the money I use is to buy.so when the price is high I still buy.when the price is low i also buybecause that's my DCA strategy. but I do it regularly every week or month.and only use really cold moneythe money I set aside that I'm even prepared to lose.but if it's hot money. then don't buy. because after buying you will think selling because you need the money to be used immediately.

comments.author: ajiz138
comments.body: This just reminds me of DCA which is still running and continues to buy, buy, buy, every week: https://dcabtc.com/?sd=2018-11-27&sda=4_years&f=weekly&d=4_years&ac=5000&c=falseIf we want to continue to accumulate bitcoins, it's better to buy at any time because if we notice some patterns, especially if we are in a bearish situation, it can be said that it is more appropriate to continue to buy with the opportunity in sight, even this for an accumulation opportunity is very appropriate from now on.We buy to become a HODLer but remember the money has to be from the money you want to buy bitcoins.Hodl 4-5 years is a good time for bitcoin.

comments.author: lalabotax
comments.body: Quote from: Zilon on November 26, 2022, 07:54:48 AMThere is no more time for analysis, research or strategy just buy!!!This works for long-term holders, but not for short-term holders or daily traders. every investment tye will need a different strategy to deal with the market situation. For long-term investments, dong DCA is much better to do, buying every time the price drops and crashes, because we will not know if the price will continue dropping again or not. That is why although we don't do exact analysis, we must still have good management of our funds, so we may not bee too greedy to buy the Bitcoin all at one time. Quote from: Zilon on November 26, 2022, 07:54:48 AMKeep buying as you buyKeep buying as long as we still have free funds to buy, not using daily funds or savings fro buying Bitcoin. Buying wisely and smartly to avoid every regret in the crypto investment. ALways think for long term investment or holding if you don't wnat to do such analysis on the market.

comments.author: Sandra_hakeem
comments.body: The 'one' thing that limits any man's progress is FEAR; which happens to be a great factor to conquer if you must HODL Bitcoin successfully. It also happens to be the worst energy, that cripple people's dream, poisons thoughts and could render any iota of prowess in anyone useless.I love that poetry; it's really educating and -- looking at it from a logical point of view, I realized that OP isn't just tryna tell us to BUY(even when it's unnecessary to buy or when it's obvious and we've realized that if we buy 'em, at some point, we are automatically loosing if it goes down again), but he's making a point, that is : "it's imperative to HODL than to SCALE" --atleast, this is how I see it.I'd say -- KEEP BUYING, JUST WHEN THE TIME IS RIGHT.Sandra 💇

comments.author: Smartvirus
comments.body: I get your point as to reasons why you feel there shouldn't be any need for analysis,  because you feel which evee way you try to tackle the market through after subjecting it to some critical analysis, you still get to lose. Even at that, you stil get to buy coin anyway should there be funds enough for a purchase.In essence, analysis is a total necessity. Its better to be wrong and learn than to be careless on the importance of analysis and be ignorant. You can base your trades on luck, on a notion of accepting whatever comes at you. Yeah, you might not he able to be in full control but you could be in some control and only analysis could help you through that. Analysis is just how trading aren't gambling.

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: I see this post not as a poem, but as a prayer. OP, you look like a fanatical person. There is another life besides bitcoin; just step away from the internet and look around. I wonder where all those institutional investors are who bought bitcoin at much higher prices. Where are they now? I think in order to be such an adherent and idealist of bitcoin, a person still needs understanding and faith. Just from post to post, the statement that there will be growth someday and that you should deprive yourself of everything but buy bitcoin will not always work.Those who do invest evaluate all the risks and invest the money that does not affect today's life. It saddens me to see how some people have made an entire religion out of bitcoin.

comments.body: Optimistic traders never worry about anything happening in the market. Buy, buy and buy has always been their passion for the long term plan. Bitcoin has never fallen into that scary abyss, what just happened in the market was a start in taking its swing to go to the moon.
